about.name: About
about.data: Autoglass Zelena is a company that has been operating in the market for over 10 years. We are engaged in the sale and installation of car windows. We have a wide range of car windows for all car brands. We provide a guarantee for all our products and services. We work with both individuals and legal entities. We are always happy to help you!

data.name: Pilkington
data.description: Pilkington is a British glass manufacturer. It is a subsidiary of the NSG Group. It is one of the leading manufacturers of glass for the automotive industry. The company produces a wide range of glass products for cars, including windshields, side windows, and rear windows.
